ygData.msgSnippet: Kedgemail gauntlets?? What the heck are kedgemail gauntlets? Elwyn Heartstring Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr ... From: SteelWolf [mailto:steelwolf@home.com]
ygData.messageBody:
Kedgemail gauntlets??
What the heck are kedgemail gauntlets?


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: SteelWolf [mailto:steelwolf@...]
Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 2:12 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Equipment


From: SteelWolf <steelwolf@...>

Well I want to see what Shada has, because she's been around forever!
"/tell Shada may I inpsect you?" ;)

Here's what I wear:

Opalline Earrings x2
Gold Black Pearl Choker (+7 dex/agi)
Guise of the Deceiver
Crown of the Frogluk Kings (for looks ;P)
Platinum Black Pearl Rings (+6 dex/agi)
Kedgemail Gauntlets
Mithril Vambraces
Imbrued Platemail Breastplate
Imbrued Platemail Bracers x2 (Lambent are arguably better stat-wise)
Flowing Black Silk Sash (effect: haste)
Gilded Cloth
Dwarven Work Boots
Silver-Plated Greaves
Black Hooded Cloak

Six-Note Blade
Short Sword of the Ykesha
Runed Bone Fork (ranged slot)

Selo's Drums of the March
Lute of the Gypsy Princess (<-- still seems to do nothing special)
Flute
(I don't carry a brass horn ;P)

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
